verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
F
He is exalted
The King is exalted on high
I will praise Him
He is exalted forever exalted
And I will praise His name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
He is the Lord
Forever His truth shall reign
Heaven and earth
Rejoice in His holy name
He is exalted
The King is exalted on high

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You are exalted
You're the King You're exalted on high
We will praise You
You are exalted forever exalted
And we will praise Your name

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
You are the Lord
Forever Your truth shall reign
Heaven and earth
Rejoice in Your holy name
You are exalted
You're The King You're exalted on high

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
You are exalted
You're The King You're exalted on high
